name: That's Life
description:
Reach the top to win! Current game can only have you move and jump along with some random generation of leaves. There are no losing conditions as of right now along with no power ups / power downs :( .

However , we are proud about how far we have gotten and we hope you can enjoy getting to the top and enjoying the scenery at least. You'll "grow" to like it :)

Currently only works on PC 

Controls: Arrow keys to move left or right Up arrow key to jump
